member.name: M:RS2008.RS2008_Console.ForceReferences
member.summary: If this function is not present, reflection will consider Exporters and Aquisitor as an unused reference and will not be shown, so the pilots will not be created. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3433973/getreferencedassemblies-doesnt-return-all-assemblies
